body_html: I still think we should put this in test_jit.py. Otherwise running test_autograd checks many components that are completely irrelevant in this case. What dependencies would that have? You can just import the specs from that file. The format doesn't really change, and the code that parses it into arguments is effectively 15 lines of code. The rest is the autograd test template, which we don't need.

body: I still think we should put this in `test_jit.py`. Otherwise running `test_autograd` checks many components that are completely irrelevant in this case. What dependencies would that have? You can just import the specs from that file. The format doesn't really change, and the code that parses it into arguments is effectively 15 lines of code. The rest is the autograd test template, which we don't need.
